description: Verify trade processing for a NEW account opened on the same day (T-day). The account_id is not in T-1 DB but is provided in the DIST_ACC file. The system must link the trade to the new account request.
source_rule_logic: The system processes 'Look-through' trading applications, which requires the 'account_id' to be present in the input to validate the investor's identity and status against the Account Map.
